conversion_verification.notes: True 3D isometric cutaway transformation successfully achieved.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and volumetric representation. Clean isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in layout. Missing one bed in the left bedroom (single instead of twin) and flipped bathroom layout.

interior_elements.notes: Most major furniture corresponds well in scale and placement. Kitchen and dining areas are accurately located.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Great contrast and lighting. Consistent material application.

detected_errors.description: Left bedroom shows only one bed; 2D plan depicts two beds.
Internal fixtures in the bathroom are mirrored/swapped compared to the source drawing.
Door swing direction in the master bedroom is inverted.

summary: A highly accurate and aesthetically clean 3D conversion that maintains almost all structural and spatial logic from the 2D floor plan.
